pullrequest.title: make gate numbers 1-based when printing message in score.log and in /vrc_score

content.raw:
got it in cd3bb99a1ee9, thanks

I also see mention of gate numbers in [vrc_task_2_tricking_scoring.test](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/47624d3aa6df2bff5ff7aca5167832610db47adf/ros/atlas_utils/test/vrc_task_2_tricking_scoring.test?at=drcsim_2.6) and [vrc_task_2_tricking_scoring_test](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/47624d3aa6df2bff5ff7aca5167832610db47adf/ros/atlas_utils/test/vrc_task_2_tricking_scoring_test?at=drcsim_2.6), but that test doesn't appear to care about the log messages.
content.html:
got it in cd3bb99a1ee9, thanks

I also see mention of gate numbers in vrc_task_2_tricking_scoring.test and vrc_task_2_tricking_scoring_test, but that test doesn't appear to care about the log messages.
